Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix PDF downloads to display actual inspector-selected scores

Fixed score retrieval in PDF generation for all inspection types to ensure 
scores displayed in downloaded PDFs match what inspectors selected on forms:

- Barbershop: Changed from querying inspection_items table to reading 
  score_XX columns from inspections table
- Swimming Pool: Changed from querying inspection_items table to reading 
  score_XX columns from inspections table  
- Meat Processing: Fixed score lookup to use zero-padded keys (01, 02, etc.)
  to match database storage format
- Spirit Licence: Changed from parsing scores string to querying 
  inspection_items table where scores are actually stored

Food Establishment, Institutional, Small Hotels, and Residential PDFs were 
already correctly retrieving scores from their respective storage locations.
